articles.author: Bianca Flowers, James Oliphant
articles.title: Trump visits Detroit church in bid to court Black voters - Reuters
articles.description: Trump focused on his core messages, blasting the Biden administration over high inflation, crime and illegal migration, which he said has harmed Black Americans in particular.

articles.author: Tim Capurso
articles.title: Luka Dončić and Kyrie Irving's Dads Shared Sweet Moment After Mavericks' Game 4 Win - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: Dallas Mavericks star Luka Dončić's father Saša shared a sweet moment with Kyrie Irving's dad Drederick following the team's 122–84 win over the Boston Celtics in Game 4 of the NBA Finals on Friday night at the American Airlines Center.
